title: Duke Energy Customers Denied Refunds Despite Illegal Charges
summary: NC court rules Duke Energy customers won't receive refunds for improperly collected charges.
charlotte_impact: Sets precedent for utility accountability and consumer protection in North Carolina.

title: Charlotte Police Seek Guardians of Found Child
summary: Police are asking for the public's help in locating the parents or guardians of a young boy found alone in north Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Highlights child safety concerns and the importance of community vigilance.

title: Rock Hill Mourns Child, Teen Killed in Shootings; Leaders Seek Solutions
summary: Community leaders seek solutions after shootings in Rock Hill claim the lives of a 4-year-old and a teenager.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the urgent need for conflict resolution and violence prevention among youth.

title: Salisbury Police Investigate Deadly Motorcycle Collision
summary: Salisbury police are searching for suspects in a collision that killed one motorcyclist and injured two others.
charlotte_impact: Raises awareness about road safety and the consequences of reckless driving.

title: Ballantyne Office Site Could Be Converted into Housing Units
summary: Plans indicate that office spaces in Charlotte's Ballantyne area may be transformed into multifamily and townhouse units.
charlotte_impact: Reflects changing urban development trends and housing demands in Charlotte.

title: Cloudy, Cooler Weather Expected with Spotty Rain
summary: The Charlotte area will experience cloudy, cooler, and breezy conditions with scattered rain on Sunday.
charlotte_impact: Provides a weather update relevant to daily activities and planning.

title: Stabbing in West Charlotte Leaves One Injured
summary: A stabbing incident on Reid Avenue in west Charlotte resulted in non-life-threatening injuries to one person.
charlotte_impact: Highlights ongoing concerns about crime and safety in certain Charlotte neighborhoods.

title: Registered Sex Offender Charged with Grooming Chesterfield County Child Online
summary: An Oregon man faces charges for allegedly grooming a Chesterfield County child on Discord using Roblox gift cards.
charlotte_impact: Emphasizes the dangers of online child exploitation and the need for parental vigilance.

title: Charlotte Woman Arrested for $7.7K Lululemon Theft
summary: A Charlotte woman with a criminal history faces felony charges after a Lululemon theft.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates the impact of repeat offenders and the challenges of retail crime.

title: Teens Charged in Rock Hill Parking Deck Shooting After Failed Robbery
summary: Two juveniles are charged after an 18-year-old was fatally shot during a robbery attempt.
charlotte_impact: Highlights youth involvement in violent crime and the consequences of robbery.

title: Family Finds Missing Eden Woman Alive After 24 Years
summary: Barbara Byrd learns her cousin Michele, missing since 2001, is alive but wishes for privacy.
charlotte_impact: Offers closure in a long-standing missing person case, though questions remain.

title: Gastonia Police Raise Thousands for Special Olympics
summary: Gastonia Police and SWAT raised $4,705 for Special Olympics, winning first place.
charlotte_impact: Showcases community engagement and support for Special Olympics by local law enforcement.

title: Police Respond to Two Separate Shootings in Salisbury
summary: Two separate shootings in Salisbury resulted in serious injuries to the victims.
charlotte_impact: Underlines the prevalence of gun violence and its impact on the community.

title: I-77S Toll Lane Project Sparks Tension in West Charlotte
summary: The proposed I-77 toll lane expansion raises concerns about its impact on historically Black neighborhoods.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the potential for infrastructure projects to disproportionately affect minority communities.

title: Asha Degree's Parents Plead for Answers 26 Years After Disappearance
summary: Asha Degree's parents continue to seek answers 26 years after her disappearance.
charlotte_impact: Reminds the public of unsolved missing person cases and the enduring hope for resolution.
